Text: So yeh think yeh can just waltz onto OUR ISLAND, eh?
Up 'ere, jackass!!!
[color=brown]BIG BORIS[color=black], COMIN' RIGHT AT-CHYEH!!!
[color=forest_green]Fernando Horhese[color=black], at your service darling.....
Oh, can I help you two?
Ahahah, ''Can I help you two'', ahahahahahah...
Hah! Yeah you can help us alright!
You can help us by... uuuuuh...
... You can help us by getting your butt kicked for us, HAH!
Ahahahahahahah...
Hmph, I actually refrain from getting in pointless squabbles, so if you wouldn't mind...
HAH! Yeah right, lad! You ain't goin' nowhere, right Fern'?
..... Well, ahahahah, it would seem as though we've neglected to give him a proper motivator...
Alas, the sunglasses man has no reason to engage in combat.
..... Aw shiet.
Yeah you're totally right actually.
Damn, we really shoulda brought a hostage or somethin'.
... Aww man, I'm gonna be sick.
Oh, Travis Pickleberry, right?
That's me, yeah.
And you are?
Y'know, Doug Thompson... your deputy?
I'm meant to assist you during the investigation and stuff.
You, uh, really don't remember being told about me?
No.
Deputy, you say?
Yeah...?
WOAH!!!!!!
Damn.
AGGHH, CHRIST, GET THE HELL OFF ME!!!!!
So, here's the deal, fool...
Either you engage in the thrill of combat with my red affiliate over here...
Or, ahahahah, I'm afraid I may have to hollow out your partners lungs via a cut through the throat.
Does that sound fair to you, Boris?
Uhhh, yeah! I guess that plan works.
So, what will it be, Mr. Pickleberry?
Choose wisely.
Oh well I guess I sort of have to fight you then don't I.
BOOOYAAHHHHH, LET'S ROCK!!!!!!
